channel.title: Adventure Items
channel.description: Find a D&D adventure to give your character the perfect piece of swag.

item.title: DDAO-48 - Pomp
item.description: Moose Bite (Lifewell Tattoo) and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Pomp

Author Only Adventure for Tier 2

Nestled deep inside a broken temple, something has awoken. Hunters are missing and the stench of death rolls across the Spine of the World. What hope can be found within the icy clutches of Icewind Dale when ancient secrets greet the light?

Items

  • Moose Bite (Lifewell Tattoo) Very Rare

Story Awards

A Moose Named Death Pet

The howling winds of Icewind Dale keep many things secret and hidden from the prying eyes of the world. For instance, the Netherese temple dedicated to Jergal, the ancient god of death, has lain dormant and alone for many hundreds of years. But you're an adventurer and when an opportunity arises to investigate (and loot!) the temples of old, you rise to the occasion. And this time was no exception—your deeds inspired the echoes of a lost god and you now find yourself in the (somewhat unenviable) position of being caretaker of his agent.

item.title: DDAO-38 - The Green Isle
item.description: Elven Chain and a story award
item.content:encoded:
The Green Isle

Author Only Adventure for Tier 2

Laeral Silverhand has tasked you with sailing to the seemingly-abandoned island of Evermeet—what will you find there?

Items

  • Elven Chain Rare

Story Awards

The Moon-Horse Pet

A Moon-Horse takes a liking to you and decides to follow you home.

item.title: CCC-ZIEGE-04-02 - The Widow's Fang
item.description: The Adventures of Cherise and Antonia (Bag of Tricks, Tan), 2 potions, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
The Widow's Fang

Convention Created Content for Tier 1

More than three decades ago, a young child became ill with a horrible disease and died. Instead of departing, her spirit lingered on as a ghost, haunting the hospital where she spent the last days of her life. Now, a new owner hopes to reopen the hospital, but first the ghost must be exorcised. Can you help the child find peace at last?

Items

  • The Adventures of Cherise and Antonia (Bag of Tricks, Tan) Uncommon
  • 2 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Revivify Uncommon

item.title: CCC-ZIEGE-04-01 - The Miser's Glory
item.description: Lantern of Revealing
item.content:encoded:
The Miser's Glory

Convention Created Content for Tier 1

Three decades ago, a terrible disease swept through the town of Shadeharbor. Nearly half the population of the village died before it ended. The cause of the disease was never discovered. Now, the town leaders from that time are turning up dead. Can you unearth the secrets that have lain buried in Shadehabor all this time?

Items

  • Lantern of Revealing Uncommon

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON12-1 - Nothing Is Sacred
item.content:encoded:
Nothing Is Sacred

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by Baldman Games on May 19, 2021

The Moonshaes are plunged into shadow and with permission of High Lady Ordalf, survivors have made their way to Gwynneth, the only Isle spared from darkness. The Conclave needs heroes to execute their plans of survival in the face of the most powerful threat the Moonshaes have yet seen, the Slain.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON12-2 - A Gift from the Queen
item.content:encoded:
A Gift from the Queen

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by Baldman Games on May 19, 2021

With the fate of the Moonshaes held in the balance, the adventurer’s path lies in the lost tomb of an ancient Queen. What answers could she possibly offer to loosen the Slain’s deadly hold on this world.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON12-3 - Tempest of Malice
item.content:encoded:
Tempest of Malice

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by Baldman Games on May 19, 2021

The key to severing the chains of the Slain is located at Tempest Keep, and the adventurers must face the impossible—brave the wrath of the elements to harness the power of the storm.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON11-1 - A Darkened City
item.content:encoded:
A Darkened City

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 12, 2021

Once brilliant Caer Callidyrr has darkened, and the Slain sits on the High King’s throne. Helpless to fight this unknowable enemy, the forces of light have asked you to infiltrate the enemy’s stronghold and learn all you can. Will you dare the shadowed streets of the capital of the Moonshaes to gain entry to the Court of the Slain?

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON11-2 - A Darkened Court
item.content:encoded:
A Darkened Court

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 12, 2021

The Court of the Slain at Caer Callidyrr holds many intrigues and even more danger. Yet you must walk these darkened halls and speak in whispers to uncover the malevolent plots of the Slain. Careful, now. One wrong step or a misplaced word could mean exposure and oblivion.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON11-3 - A Darkened Heart
item.content:encoded:
A Darkened Heart

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 12, 2021

You have worked your way to the heart of the Darkened Court at Caer Callidyrr. There, you have a chance to pierce the shadows and secrets that surround and protect the Slain. Can you reveal the mystery of the greatest threat to the Moonshaes and will you survive to tell anyone else?

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON10-1 - Whispers & Warnings
item.content:encoded:
Whispers & Warnings

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Baldman Games on May 9, 2021

The reach of the Shadowfell has come to Alaron! The Great Gark's forces are intent on spreading the Howling Disease throughout the island, and the fey are in dire peril. Will you ride to their aid or will the shadow spread across the land? Part One of The Dark Tidings trilogy.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON10-2 - Shadows & Shrouds
item.content:encoded:
Shadows & Shrouds

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Baldman Games on May 9, 2021

A new threat is gaining power over the moonwells of Alaron, and the druids of the Earthmother believe the best way to uncover the sinister plot is to venture into the Shadowfell itself. Part Two of The Dark Tidings trilogy.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON10-3 - Fortresses & Fortunes
item.content:encoded:
Fortresses & Fortunes

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Baldman Games on May 9, 2021

A mysterious force from the Shadowfell threatens the high seat of power in Alaron! With an army marching to the capital and enemies within Caer Callidyrr, the royal family places their trust in outsiders to root out the evil within before the enemies overwhelm the last free human kingdom of the Moonshaes! Part Three of The Dark Tidings trilogy.

item.title: DDAL-EB-16 - The Dragon Below
item.description: Dryyn's Tentacle Whip, Living Armor, Living Gloves, 3 legacy events, and 2 other items
item.content:encoded:
The Dragon Below

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 3 Released on May 2, 2021

In the depths of Valaara's sanctuary, the Order of the Emerald Claw harnesses ancient engines of destruction to wage war on the surface world. Only the Oracle of War can stop them now—if the adventurers can get it to work! This is the third in a trilogy of adventures, the Engines of War storyline.

Items

  • Dryyn's Tentacle Whip Very Rare
  • Living Armor Very Rare
  • Living Gloves Uncommon
  • 2 x Oil of Etherealness Rare

Legacy Events

Madness Unleashed

You freed Valaara, “the Crawing Queen” from the Deepest Hive, her demiplane lair in the depths of Khyber. Spinweave told you Valaara would only briefly be freed, and Spinweave wouldn't lie to you. Besides, what's unleashing one of the daelkyr between friends, really?

Making Trouble

Trez Zul revealed that the Lord of Blades is searching the ruins of Making for a creation forged hidden inside a secret Cyran government facility. The Lord of Blades is capturing and interrogating Cyran officers to uncover the location of this base.

Secret of the Triune

You gave the three genies bound within the Oracle of War a secret. What will come of this fledgling bond of trust between you and the Lamannian Triune?

item.title: DDAL10-08 - Volatile Thoughts
item.description: Boots of Levitation
item.content:encoded:
Volatile Thoughts

Season 10 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on April 15, 2021

Just when you thought Realmspace-faring slavers were the worst thing that could cross your path, it quickly became apparent you were wrong—terrible things lurk in the depths of the longdead Abeiran city of Xorvintroth. And when faced with countless, unfathomable horrors infesting an ancient city of a long-dead civilization from another world there’s only one solution…explosives. Part Eight of the Plague of Ancients series of adventures.

Items

  • Boots of Levitation Rare

item.title: DDAL-EB-15 - Dream Eater
item.description: Bracers of Archery, Staff of the Woodlands, and 3 legacy events
item.content:encoded:
Dream Eater

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 3 Released on April 5, 2021

Across Eberron, the spirits of the dead stir as the Order of the Emerald Claw draws back the veil to Dolurrh. To avert calamity, the adventurers must cut a deal with an infamous bonecaster of the Talenta Plains—the Dream Eater—and her pack of loyal tyrannosaurs. This is the second in a trilogy of adventures, the Engines of War storyline.

Items

  • Bracers of Archery Uncommon
  • Staff of the Woodlands Rare

Legacy Events

Allosaurus Mount Pet
Dragon Spirit

In the mists of the Boneyard, you allowed the restless spirit of a silver dragon to latch onto your soul. While the dragon spirit dwells inside you, you are immune to the Frightful Presence of dragons and have resistance to damage from their breath weapons.

Dream Walker

You helped the Dream Eater lay the restless spirit of hte dragon Carnelian to rest. At the end of the adventure, choose one of the following rewards:

  • The Dream Eater performs a ritual that grants you resistance to necrotic damage for the duration of your next adventure.
  • If you chose the allosaurus mount as a reward, the halfling Norrin teaches it the “Talenta Dodge”. If the allosaurus is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. (Norrin must survive the adventure to offer this training.)
  • If you chose the bracers of archery reward, the halfling Davric enchants your quiver with a luck charm. When you roll a 1 on a d20 for an attack roll with an arrow drawn from this quiver, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll. (Davric must survive the adventure to offer this reward.)

item.title: DC-PoA-GaryXIII-04 - As Above, So Below
item.description: Cast-Off Armor (Breastplate), Guardian Emblem, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
As Above, So Below

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 25, 2021

Adventure Seed: Holy Auril, Mother of Cod

A lottery held under suspicous circumstances. A Paladin trying to do the right thing. Can the adventurers find the truth in time? Part Four of the To Survive the Night series.

Items

  • Cast-Off Armor (Breastplate) Common
  • Guardian Emblem Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Detect Evil and Good Common

item.title: DC-PoA-GaryXIII-05 - Shard of Hope
item.description: Arcane Grimoire, +1, Illuminator's Tattoo, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Shard of Hope

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 25, 2021

Adventure Seed: This Seems Familiar

When arcane experimentation creates artifacts that ensnare the mind and beguile the senses, only the bravest adventurers can resist the toxic temptation of desecration and darkness, to travel to where this evil lies and defeat it. Lies are brought to bear and secrets are revealed. Part Five of the To Survive the Night series.

Items

  • Arcane Grimoire, +1 Uncommon
  • Illuminator's Tattoo Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-GaryXIII-01 - Little Feet, Cold Nights
item.description: All-Purpose Tool, +1, Boots of False Tracks, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Little Feet, Cold Nights

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 24, 2021

Adventure Seed: My, What Big Feet You Have

Strange lights in the forest, claw marks on the doors of regular citizens, and worst of all; their beloved pets are being attacked and killed. The town of West Easthaven is under attack by unknown forces for nefarious reasons. Can our adventurers put together the clues to make sense of these strange events or will the citizens continue to be terrorized by these odd disturbances? Part One of the To Survive the Night series.

Items

  • All-Purpose Tool, +1 Uncommon
  • Boots of False Tracks Common
  • 1 x Scroll of Protection from Evil and Good Common

item.title: DC-PoA-GaryXIII-02 - A New Place to Call Home
item.description: Mirror of the Past, Mithral Armor (scale, barding only), and 6 other items
item.content:encoded:
A New Place to Call Home

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 24, 2021

Adventure Seed: Ageless Hunger

Undead pour from an abandon keep in The Frozen North, threatening the already tenuous balance of life in the Ten-Towns, as an unlikely benefactor seeks heroes in hopes of turning this keep into a future stronghold. Secrets and dangers await the heroes as they venture out into the unforgiving cold. Part Two of the To Survive the Night series.

Items

  • Mirror of the Past Rare
  • Mithral Armor (scale, barding only) Uncommon
  • 6 x Bone-Tipped Arrow, +1 Uncommon

item.title: DC-PoA-GaryXIII-03 - Personal Fouls and Penalties
item.description: Cloak of the Manta Ray, Wand of Pyrotechnics, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Personal Fouls and Penalties

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 24, 2021

Adventure Seed: Goat-ball!

Morale in the small village of Goodenow has fallen to an all-time low with the suspicious death of the star goat-ball player on the eve of a big match. When a shadowy enemy begins to target a local team of bonesetters, the mystery deepens. Is it game over in Goodenow? Part Three of the To Survive the Night series.

Items

  • Cloak of the Manta Ray Uncommon
  • Wand of Pyrotechnics Common
  • 1 x Potion of Watchful Rest Common

item.title: DDAL10-07 - Into Darkness
item.description: Dark Shard Amulet and Mace of Smiting
item.content:encoded:
Into Darkness

Season 10 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 11, 2021

Times have been especially hard on the goliaths of Wyrmdoom Crag, and losing the few hunters they have left to neogi slavers will certainly spell their doom. You must delve into the ruins of an ancient city buried beneath the Spine of the World. What secrets lay in the deep dark? Do they promise salvation or doom? Part Seven of the Plague of Ancients series of adventures.

Items

  • Dark Shard Amulet Common
  • Mace of Smiting Rare

item.title: DDAL-EB-14 - From Dust
item.description: Gisaul's Spellbook (Libram of Souls and Flesh), Tentacle Rod, a spellbook, 3 legacy events, and 2 other items
item.content:encoded:
From Dust

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 3 Released on March 8, 2021

Deep beneath Metrol, the Order of the Emerald Claw is excavating the ruins of a haunted daelkyr sanctuary. Sulring Mroranon knows a sage who can provide vital information about the dig site, but there's a catch—they've not been seen for over a century. This is the first in a trilogy of adventures, the Engines of War storyline.

Items

  • Gisaul's Spellbook (Libram of Souls and Flesh) Rare
  • Tentacle Rod Rare
  • 1 x Dust of Disappearance Uncommon
  • 1 x Elixir of Health Rare

Spellbooks

  • Gisaul's Spellbook: mage armor, ray of sickness, blindness/deafness, ray of enfeeblement, web, bestow curse, vampiric touch, blight, dimension door, stoneskin, Bigby's hand, and cloudkill

Legacy Events

Desperate Measures

Spinweave taught you how to temporarily release Valaara from Khyber by performing a ritual in the Creeping Nave. This could prove…useful?

Survivors of the Thorn Expedition

Some members of the Thorn Expedition are still alive. Check who survived below:

  • Gisaul Varren
  • Drago
Tavern Tale Spinner

You impressed the dwarves at the Stone Golem tavern with your tale-spinning prowess. At the end of this adventure, you can return to the Stone Golem to carouse with the dwarves.

RollResult
1–2You gain a hipflask of Frostmantle Fire, a string dwarven liquor. If you drink from this hipflask as an action, you are immune to fear for 1 hour. You can drink from the hipflask three times before it empties.
3–4The dwarves etch your tale into the walls of the tavern, immortalizing your legend in dwarf lore. You begin your next adventure with 2 hero points.
5–6One of the noble dwarves is so impressed with your tales that she commissions a bejeweled ivory statue of you or one of your companions (value 1,500 gp, but can only be sold at market for 500 gp).

item.title: DDEP10-01 - Terror in Ten-Towns
item.description: Bracers of Archery, Chardalyn Earring (Headband of Intellect), Charlatan’s Die, Pole of Angling, a potion, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Terror in Ten-Towns

Season 10 Epic for Tier 1 Released on March 4, 2021

As a beastly army approaches Ten-Towns from the south, heroes take the lead in fortifications and defense. But can the heroes’ optimistic hard work overcome the worst enemy—the towns’ distrust of one another?

Items

  • Bracers of Archery Uncommon
  • Chardalyn Earring (Headband of Intellect) Uncommon
  • Charlatan’s Die Common
  • Pole of Angling Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

Story Awards

Defender of Easthaven

Alongside other skilled warriors, you successfully defended Easthaven, along with one of the other towns in the adventure.

item.title: DDAL10-05 - A Blight in the Darkness
item.description: Chardalyn Breastplate (Armor of Necrotic Resistance), Wand of Pyrotechnics, a potion, a scroll, and 3 story awards
item.content:encoded:
A Blight in the Darkness

Season 10 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on March 2, 2021

The wicked owlbear Frostclaw was nearly defeated. Now it’s time to finish the deed and destroy her and her master once and for all. But first, you must find them. Track them down and save Ten-Towns! Part Five of the Plague of Ancients series of adventures.

Items

  • Chardalyn Breastplate (Armor of Necrotic Resistance) Rare
  • Wand of Pyrotechnics Common
  • 1 x Potion of Resistance (Acid) Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Spider Climb Uncommon

Story Awards

Corrupted Chardalyn Infusion

Characters who fail their saving throw against the exploding chardalyn staff earn this story award.

Sing a Song of Vengeance

The characters earn this story award if they bring Feral-Tongue and Kaskur back to Wyrmdoom Crag alive.

The Song Falls Silent

The characters earn this story award if Kaskur dies during the adventure and isn’t returned to life.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON9-1 - Dark Moon Rising
item.content:encoded:
Dark Moon Rising

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on February 22, 2021

A vitally important diplomat has gone missing, and a village seems to be troubled by an unseen force that threatens to spread all across the Moonshaes. All the while, a massive volcano rumbles in its slumber, threatening to awake, bringing forth chaos and destruction. A Dark Moon Rises over the island of Norland. Can you come to its aid? Part One of the Dark Moon trilogy.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON9-2 - Dark Moon Marching
item.content:encoded:
Dark Moon Marching

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on February 22, 2021

Fighting factions in Rogarsheim increase the peril of the duergar and the threat from the Shadowfell. Can the characters uncover the darkness in Rogarsheim and unite the people against the threat from the Shadowfell? Part Two of the Dark Moon trilogy.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON9-3 - Dark Moon Bound
item.content:encoded:
Dark Moon Bound

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on February 22, 2021

The characters need to recruit a cleric of Valkur to help them defeat the shadow army before the firbolg shaman and his minions rout the army of Norland with their spells of fear and terror. Will the characters persuade the cleric to assist them and return to the battlefield in time for Valkur to aid them all? Part Three of the Dark Moon trilogy.

item.title: DDAL10-06 - The Fallen Star
item.description: Chime of Opening, Prosthetic Limb, 2 potions, a story award, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
The Fallen Star

Season 10 Adventure for Tier 2 Released on February 11, 2021

As the last vestiges of Feral-Tongue’s legacy echo across Icewind Dale, an ominous sign makes itself known. A falling star far to the west heralds a new unknown. A goliath hunting party returns to Wyrmdoom Crag, speaking of a strange creature. Perhaps it may be the key to discovering the source of the mysterious light. Part Six of the Plague of Ancients series of adventures.

Items

  • Chime of Opening Rare
  • Prosthetic Limb Common
  • 1 x Charm of the Ice Troll Unique
  • 1 x Potion of Climbing Common
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon

Story Awards

Captured Goliaths

Nararhak Tree-Eye and some of the goliath hunters you encountered were captured by spiderlike creatures Lieutenant Prook calls “neogi.”

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK3-09 - A Convergence of Gods
item.description: Tome of the Stilled Tongue, a potion, and 2 other items
item.content:encoded:
A Convergence of Gods

Convention Created Content for Tier 4 Released by Gamehole Publishing on January 25, 2021

The area known as Godswalk Keep has been showing signs of activity. Are the Bloodreavers really working towards bringing back Garagos and restoring him to divine status? Only true heroes of the Border Kingdoms can stop them.

Items

  • Tome of the Stilled Tongue Legendary
  • 1 x Elixir of Health Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Heroism Rare
  • 1 x Oil of Sharpness Very Rare

item.title: DDAL10-04 - Cold Benevolence
item.description: Robe of Useful Items, a potion, and 3 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Cold Benevolence

Season 10 Adventure for Tier 1 Released on January 25, 2021

Feral-Tongue must be stopped! But without aid, it’s likely that your efforts will be in vain. Among rising tensions, Old Goat suggests an unlikely ally: Chwingas! Her plan, however, isn’t popular among other members of the clan. Can you sway their opinion? Better still, can you find the elusive elemental spirits? Part Four of the Plague of Ancients series of adventures.

Items

  • Robe of Useful Items Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Resistance (Cold) Uncommon

Story Awards

Charm of Lor the Timid

The characters earn this story award if they successfully persuade Lor the Timid to aid them.

Charm of Sappa Everwatching

The characters earn this story award if they successfully persuade Sappa Ever-Watching to aid them.

Charm of Singing Gir

The characters earn this story award if they successfully persuade Singing Gir to aid them.

item.title: DDAL-EB-13 - Stonefire
item.description: Elemntal Airship, Mace of Disruption, Ring of Evasion, Shield, +3, and 4 legacy events
item.content:encoded:
Stonefire

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 3 Released on January 24, 2021

The light of the Silver Flame shields all who bathe in its glory, but also casts deep shadows. When heretics in the fortress city of Flamekeep emerge from the dark, the Cathedral of the Silver Flame becomes the last bastion in a citywide conflict. This is the third in a trilogy of adventures, the Drums of War storyline.

Items

  • Elemntal Airship Unique
  • Mace of Disruption Rare
  • Ring of Evasion Rare
  • Shield, +3 Very Rare

Legacy Events

Battlefield Medic

You helped Keeper Jaela Daran tend to the wounded. Later in the campaign, you may discover the consequences of this action.

Divine Vigilance

You persuaded the Keeper of the Flame to begin peace talks with Breland to unite against the threat posed by the Lord of Blades.

Traitor Sphinx

Flamewind survived her failed ambush and fled into Sharn. You haven't seen the last of her, for sure.

Trust No One

You helped Lukas Varko escaped the Cathedral of the Flame. Perhaps you'll see him again in the future…

item.title: DDAL-EB-12 - The Waiting Game
item.description: Ring of Regeneration, a potion, and a legacy event
item.content:encoded:
The Waiting Game

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 3 Released on January 4, 2021

Narcy of Xandrar offers safe haven in the towers of Arcanix, but even she can't foresee the coming storm. Across the centuries, dead hands move their puppets in a grand conspiracy to control the Draconic Prophecy. They predicted the Oracle of War's creation, and now their agents lie in wait for the day they can seize it for themselves. That day is today. This is the second in a trilogy of adventures, the Drums of War storyline.

Items

  • Ring of Regeneration Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Superior Healing Rare

Legacy Events

Heroic Failure

You failed to stop Immeral's plan before at least one of the floating towers were crashed into Arcanix:

  • For each tower that fell (to the maximum of 3), you MUST refuse the next hero point earned during a future adventure. When you've refused hero points equal to the number of fortresses that crashed, remove this legacy event from your character.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON8-1 - Blood on the Moors
item.content:encoded:
Blood on the Moors

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on December 10, 2020

The rumored death of a unicorn protector has everyone concerned as all eyes in the Moonshaes turn to Moray. When the expedition sent to investigate doesn’t return, the fires of panic begin to roar. What evil awaits you on the moors? Part One of The Dawn of the Darkening trilogy.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON8-2 - Breasal Strife
item.content:encoded:
Breasal Strife

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on December 10, 2020

The Naïlo Expedition stumbled their way into the dreaded Breasal Marsh. It’s deadly enough in its own right without the added threat of sinister shadows. Is there anyone with the courage to follow and rescue them? Part Two of The Dawn of the Darkening trilogy.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON8-3 - A Grim View of Farview
item.content:encoded:
A Grim View of Farview

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on December 10, 2020

Following the trail of a lost expedition, all signs point to the small Northlander town of Farview. Day blends into night and the townsfolk are acting strangely. Hopefully some answers cna be foudn here, along with warmth and rest. Part Three of The Dawn of the Darkening trilogy.

item.title: DC-PoA-GSP01-01 - A Wolf's Whisper
item.description: Boots of the Winterlands, Pole of Angling, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
A Wolf's Whisper

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released by Greasy Snitches on December 5, 2020

Adventure Seed: Awake and Afraid

Talking beasts have been wandering around Easthaven, whispering about a crimson star. The villagers, taking advantage of this situation, are killing these animals for food. One injured wolf managed to evade the hunters, but they are not willing to let their game escape. Part One of The Crimson Star series.

Items

  • Boots of the Winterlands Uncommon
  • Pole of Angling Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: DC-PoA-GSP03-01 - The Missing Link
item.description: Boots of False Tracks, Dust of Disappearance, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
The Missing Link

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released by Greasy Snitches on November 30, 2020

Adventure Seed: Once Bitten, Twice Shy

Someone's mysterious disappearance started a chain of kidnappings, the most recent of which is tied to someone dear to an old man. He is desperate to find out where they were taken. Can the adventurers unravel the mystery behind these missing individuals? Part One of The Frozen Eye series.

Items

  • Boots of False Tracks Common
  • Dust of Disappearance Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Climbing Common

item.title: DDAL-EB-11 - My Undying Heart
item.description: Armor, +1, Barding, +1, Crystal Skull, a potion, a scroll, and 2 legacy events
item.content:encoded:
My Undying Heart

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 3 Released on November 30, 2020

High above Karrnath, the adventurers present the Oracle of War to the Institute of the Twelve. The dragonmarked houses promise security, but dead eyes are watching from the dark. In this nation of storms, the drums of war are beating again. The first in a trilogy of adventures, the Drums of War storyline.

Items

  • Armor, +1 Rare
  • Barding, +1 Rare
  • Crystal Skull Unique
  • 1 x Potion of Resistance (Fire) Uncommon
  • 1 x Scroll of Protection (Undead) Rare

Legacy Events

Crystal Skull

Irullan Karnach confessed that she delivered a crystal skull with the power to bring the dead back to life to the Order of the Emerald Claw.

Rescued Agent

You freed Leele d'Jorasco from captivity in the Emerald Claw enclave. She promises to aid you again in the future.

item.content:encoded:
The Coldlight Star

Dungeoncraft Adventure for Tier 1 Released by The Legitimate Business on November 28, 2020

Adventure Seed: The Warmest Day

A day of unusual warmth slices through the everlasting rime, giving the town of Termalaine a ray of hope. But only a fool would think breaking Auril’s hold would be easy. Can you weather what mortal hubris has wrought? Or will Termalaine be undone by…The Coldlight Star.

item.description: Sending Stones, 2 potions, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Gnashing Teeth

Season 10 Adventure for Tier 1 Released on November 14, 2020

The goliaths of Wyrmdoom Crag are a proud, but thankfully, generous people. Having provided you with shelter from the deadly wilds of Icewind Dale, they’ve asked you to look into the strange things that have been happening in and around their home. Part Two of the Plague of Ancients series of adventures. Part Two of the Plague of Ancients series of adventures.

Items

  • Sending Stones Uncommon

On Thin Ice

You’ve damaged your relationship with someone in the Thuunlakalaga clan.

One Man's Junk

You've caught the attention of a geedy mud mephit.

item.title: DDAL10-03 - Divining Evil
item.description: Boots of Striding and Springing, a potion, a scroll, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Divining Evil

Season 10 Adventure for Tier 1 Released on November 14, 2020

A gruesome discovery sets you off into the frozen wastes in search of answers. Will you find the answers you seek, or will your journey leave you with only more questions? Part Three of the Plague of Ancients series of adventures.

The chardalyn arrowhead is corrupted, and a character possessing it is likely to act more rashly and becomes more irritable—a trait the character should add to their flaws.

item.title: DDAL-EBEP-02 - Rolling Thunder
item.description: Boots of Speed, Hat of Disguise, Stone of Good Luck (Luckstone), and 5 legacy events
item.content:encoded:
Rolling Thunder

Oracle of War Epic for Tier 2 Released on November 9, 2020

In this Epic event, the adventurers infiltrate the royal lightning rail train to steal a ledger belonging to the king’s brother, Kor ir’Wynarn. With war brewing between Breland and Thrane, Lord Kor rides north to Sword Keep to defend the border—but scheming forces intend to strike him down before he gets there.

Items

  • Boots of Speed Rare
  • Hat of Disguise Uncommon
  • Stone of Good Luck (Luckstone) Uncommon

Legacy Events

Death is a Door

You died while trying to rob the royal lightning rail train Excelsior. Mysterious forces brought you back to life, but you don't know who or what they are.

Mournland Dossier

You stole a dossier of intelligence on the Mournland, which Sky is convinced can help her find her missing father.

Oracle Dossier

You stole a file of top secret intelligence on the Oracle of War. The information held within is encoded and can't be decrypted until you play DDAL-EB-11 My Undying Heart. While you have this legacy event marked, Sky Blue and Earl cannot appear in DDAL-EB-08, DDAL-EB-09, or DDAL-EB-10.

Regicide

Lord Kor ir'Wynarn, the “King in Green”, brother to King Boranel of Breland, is dead. This event is sure to forment trouble later in the campaign!

Swords of Liberty

You identified the Swords of Liberty as being responsible for the attack on Lord Kor. You may be able to use this information to your advantage in the future.

item.title: DDAL-DRW-06 - Thimblerigging
item.description: Necklace of Prayer Beads, Ioun Stone of Vitality, 2 potions, and a legacy event
item.content:encoded:
Thimblerigging

Dreams of Red Wizards Adventure for Tier 3 Released on October 27, 2020

The chase is on to recover the stolen Wyrmskull Throne. Getting ahead of the Cult of the Dragon will require secret lore, favors from new friends—and an excursion to a site of forgotten horrors. Part Three of the Storm King’s Descent series of adventures.

Items

  • Necklace of Prayer Beads Rare
  • Ioun Stone of Vitality Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Heroism Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Superior Healing Rare

Legacy Events

Code Breaker

You have made a copy of The Death of the Mind, the book requested by Master Reader Alsbith. Written in a code using an ancient dialect of Chultan, the book is nearly indecipherable. If you speak Chultan or can use magic or class features every day to read it, you can attempt to break the code. Spend 10 DT and attempt a DC 20 Intelligence check in front of your DM. If you are successful, you will eventually crack the code in a future adventure. If not, you fail, but you can choose to spend another 10 DT and try again.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON7-1 - The Temple of the Beast
item.description: Staff of the Python
item.content:encoded:
The Temple of the Beast

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on October 26, 2020

The Temple of the Beast was one of the most dangerous temples kept by the old druids of the Earthmother. Revering wild and unpredictable beasts came with much risk. Surviving its trials may be your undoing! Part One of the Temples of the Earthmother trilogy.

Items

  • Staff of the Python Uncommon

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON7-2 - The Temple of the Sun
item.description: one other item
item.content:encoded:
The Temple of the Sun

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on October 26, 2020

The Temple of the Sun provided hope to the servants of the Earthmother when events in their lives looked the most dire. Now that the temple has returned, it has become a beacon for those who love the light. But it is also a target for those who dwell in the shadows. Part Two of the Temples of the Earthmother trilogy.

Items

  • 1 x Elemental Gem (Red Corundum) Uncommon

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON7-3 - The Temple of Death

item.content:encoded:
The Temple of Death

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on October 26, 2020

When the ancient Temple of Death reappears on Oman Island, those devoted to the Earthmother are determined to reconsecrate it to the goddess. However, a necromancer feels that it is his birthright to claim it as his lair as well. Part Three of the Temples of the Earthmother trilogy.

Items

  • Cloak of Protection Uncommon

item.title: DDAL10-01 - The Frozen North
item.description: Goggles of Night, Illuminator's Tattoo, 3 potions, and 3 story awards
item.content:encoded:
The Frozen North

Season 10 Adventure for Tier 1 Released on October 16, 2020

An avalanche has stranded you and your allies in the treacherous Spine of the World, and a relentless blizzard is quickly blowing away all hope of survival. Gather the surviving members of your caravan and strike out for shelter. Strike out for life! Part One of the Plague of Ancients series of adventures.

Items

  • Goggles of Night Uncommon
  • Illuminator's Tattoo Common
  • 1 x Potion of Comprehend Languages Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Growth Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

Story Awards

Frostbitten

You’ve gained levels of exhaustion. This story award is removed at the end of the adventure.

  • Exhaustion Levels: ❏❏❏❏
The Rescuers

You rescued (and lost) the following sidekicks:

  • The Expert
  • The Spellcaster
  • The Warrior
The Special Delivery

A parcel containing a delivery of homemade goods to persons unknown. The crate and its contents count as a single trinket—one person among the group can keep them. While the individual items aren’t really useful, if the characters can figure out who they were intended for, the recipient may be incredibly happy to have them.

item.title: DDAL-EB-10 - Judgment of Iron
item.description: Belt of Dwarvenkind, Brooch of Shielding, Sending Stones, a spellbook, and 3 legacy events
item.content:encoded:
Judgment of Iron

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 2 Released on October 6, 2020

The Brelish army advances into the Mournland in a doomed assault on the enclave of the Lord of Blades. A massacre is almost guaranteed—but the adventurers have other goals in mind. Amid the horror of war, they attempt to spring the artificer Sulring Mroranon from his prison. The third in a trilogy of adventures, the Dogs of War storyline.

Items

  • Belt of Dwarvenkind Rare
  • Brooch of Shielding Uncommon
  • Sending Stones Uncommon

Spellbooks

  • Flechette's Brassbound Spellbook: fire bolt, light, prestidigitation, shocking grasp, detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield, misty step, suggestion, counterspell, fireball, fly, greater invisibility, ice storm, and cone of cold

Legacy Events

Arcane Kinetics

You defeated the warforged mage Flechette and seized her spellbook. At the end of any core adventure in the Oracle of War campaign, you can gain the following benefit:

  • Copy a wizard spell of 5th level or lower from legal sources into your spellbook, ritual book, or Book of Shadows at no cost. You must have the Book of Ancient Secrets invocation at add to your Book of Shadows.
Argonth Survivor

You were there when Argonth fell to the Lord of Blades. Your time on the floating fortress means you're familiar with its layout, attack capabilities, and defenses.

Your Face Is Known

You defeated the Lord of Blades' lieutenant in sight of him and lived to tell the tale. Next time, you might not be so lucky.

item.title: DDAL-DRW-05 - Uncertain Scrutiny

item.content:encoded:
Uncertain Scrutiny

Dreams of Red Wizards Adventure for Tier 3 Released on September 27, 2020

In search of King Hekaton, you must enter the dread land of Thay—but getting in will prove less difficult than getting out. Part Two of the Storm King’s Descent series of adventures.

  • Horn of Silent Alarm Common

You rescued the Thayan political prisoner Trildor Zihial from the dungeons beneath the Citadel, and he survived to tell the tale. He owes you his life and swears to dedicate his freedom to continuing to oppose Szass Tam’s tyrannical rule over Thay.

item.content:encoded:
Great Knucklehead Rally

Season 10 Epic for Tier 1 Released on September 18, 2020

To fight the despair brought on by the Everlasting Rime, an eccentric dwarf sponsors a fishing tournament she calls the “Great Knucklehead Rally.” The event draws the curious, the hopeful, and the cynical alike. And it also draws unexpected guests that test the mettle of the attendees.

A trek toward Icewind Dale turns deadly when an avalanche blocks the heroes’ passage through the Spine of the World. Rescued by a menagerie of strange creatures, the heroes are asked to return the favor in exchange for answers about what’s happening in the cold and frozen North.

item.title: DDAL-EB-09 - Lord Bucket
item.description: Shield, +2 and 4 legacy events
item.content:encoded:
Lord Bucket

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 2 Released on August 31, 2020

When word reaches Breland that the Lord of Blades is plotting an attack, the outpost of Salvation becomes the first line of defense. In preparation for war, the Brelish army enlists the adventurers to secure the outpost, serving under the vainglorious General Karol Tyresh; a buffoon known to his troops as “Lord Bucket.” The second in a trilogy of adventures, the Dogs of War storyline.

Items

  • Shield, +2 Rare

Legacy Events

Captured!

You've been captured by the Lord of Blades and taken into the Mournland! You being the next adventure confined in one of the Lord of Blades' enclaves.

Not This Time, Death

You saved General Tyresh from an apparent assassination attempt, perpetrated by someone loyal to Breland. While he's unlikely to publicly acknowledge your bravery, he repays you for it in private. General Tyresh provides you with 100 gp from his personal coffers in honor of saving his life.

Sky Fall

Sky Blue's been captured by the Lord of Blades! Will you seek her out and free her?

Your Face Is Known

You have brought yourself to the Lord of Blades' attention—as a killer of warforged and an obstable to his plans to form a warforged nation. Who knows how far across Khovaire his reach extends…?

Ally of the Zulkir

You offered a favor to the wizard Khynree and passed up a chance to repay that debt. Since you refused him once, your debt has grown. To clear your debt, Khynree requires that you forfeit a common or rarer permanent magic item or a rare or rarer consumable magic item.

One Last Job

A House Divided

A retired paladin’s disappearance and rumors of his manor being haunted cause the local Temple of Selûne to hire adventurers to investigate. What secrets does the manor hold? Part One of the Avatar of Shar adventures.

Secrets of the Moon

The Patchwork Tower

item.content:encoded:
Road to Reconciliation

The Eraka clan vowed to raid any caravan leaving Phlan until the high chieftain's daughter is returned from captivity. Can you prevent war between the Eraka and Algreth’s aggressive merchant company?

Items

  • Boots of False Tracks Common
  • Saddle of the Cavalier Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Locate Animals or Plants Uncommon

Story Awards

Benevolent Takeover

Jereth’s successful leadership of Kolwyn’s Caravan has earned you favour among the merchants of Phlan. They may offer further opportunities in the future.

Eraka Peacemaker

After negotiating a successful treaty, you are respected by the Eraka as an agent for peace. You may call upon them for assistance in the future.

item.title: CCC-CNE-06 - Burst!
item.description: Dagger of Venom, Wand of Web, and 3 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Burst!

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on August 2, 2020

A stolen artifact and a missing adventuring party sends a group of heroes on a hunt across the Moonsea Region. Unfortunately, the heroes will wind up being the prey. Part One of the Vhaeraun-Touched series.

Items

  • Dagger of Venom Rare
  • Wand of Web Uncommon

Story Awards

Eye of Lolth

A golden bracelet with a ruby magically suspended in the center is on the ground next to the him. No part of the ruby touches the bracelet. It seems to float in the gap between the gold. There’s writing in Undercommon on the bracelet, the Eye of Lolth. It reads: From the Demon Webs, Lolth sees all who scheme against Her.”

This isn’t a magic item, but an item sacred to Lolth and her followers. It only exists in this adventure and cannot be attained for any future games.

Characters will not be able to acquire the item and keep it. Lolth arranges for her minions of spiders to take the Eye of Lolth at the end of the adventure.

“Kill Me.”

If an adventurer puts a humanoid about to die giving birth to a Vhaeraun-touched drider out of his misery in this adventure, her sanity teeters. Whenever faced with a similar situation in the Vhaeraun Touched series, the DM is advised to describe the character’s struggle with her sanity.

Web Weary

Adventurers who survive this adventure know how to tread cautiously through Vhaeraun-touched drider lairs and rescue allies trapped in Vhaeraun-touched drider webs. This may have great benefit in future Vhaeraun Touched adventures.

item.title: CCC-EPI-01-02 - Hordes of Thar: The Bloody Crescent
item.description: The Harbinger (Glaive of Warning) and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Hordes of Thar: The Bloody Crescent

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Adventurers Anonymous Manila on August 2, 2020

Melvaunt’s guards are found dead in the barracks, the mark of an orcish murder god splattered on their walls. While the assassins are elusive, the Emerald Enclave has found a way to track them to their shadowy hold in the form of a strange hermit. Will the adventurers bring light to the situation or be lost in the dark?

Items

  • The Harbinger (Glaive of Warning) Uncommon

Story Awards

The Mark of Seasons

As thanks for killing Gnott, Tita Malas offers adventurers a tattoo that can tell the seasons. Adventurers who choose to accept gain a tattoo (characters can decide where on their body) of a balete tree that changes its appearance to match the current season (spring, summer, autumn, or winter) of the area they are in. Bearing this mark may have some bearing on future adventures.

Silencing the Shadows

Defeating Gnott stops the servants of Shaargas from joining the main orc horde. No doubt this would have some effect on future adventures involving the battle to come.

item.title: CCC-MAG-01-01 - Mischief at the Festival
item.description: a potion, a scroll, a spellbook, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Mischief at the Festival

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on August 2, 2020

The annual Magic and Gold Festival in Thentia has begun! Come watch some shows, eat some food, play some games, and solve a murder.

Items

  • 1 x Potion of Growth Uncommon
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Major Image Uncommon

Spellbooks

  • Dr. Dalathon’s Spellbook: catapult, longstrider, alter self, darkvision, Maximilian's earthen grasp, skywrite, tiny servant, water breathing, and stone shape

Story Awards

A Dapper Familiar Familiar

Only a character with at least one level in warlock can gain this story award.

You have made friends with Dapper the imp. If you have Pact of the Chain, you can summon Dapper as your imp familiar (no mechanical changes from a normal Pact of the Chain imp familiar). Dapper is a cheerful, three-eyed imp who loves to eat, and she tries to lick everything at least once just to see how it tastes. She is egotistical and self-aggrandizing, and once summoned by a warlock, she insists that she is the master and the warlock is her familiar.

Moonsea Liberator

You helped lead the Welbers, a family of escaped slaves from Melvaunt, to safety out of Thentia. Because of your good deed, Edea Valkrana has welcomed you into the Moonsea Liberation Society and given you a small clay tile carved with the symbol of a pair of crossed feathers. Any slave or abolitionist who sees this symbol recognizes you as an ally.

item.title: CCC-MAG-01-02 - Murder at the Festival!
item.description: Bag of Tricks (Tan), Wand of Smiles, a story award, and 3 other items
item.content:encoded:
Murder at the Festival!

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on August 2, 2020

A series of grisly murders threatens the festivities at the annual Magic and Gold Festival in Thentia! Can your group of adventurers uncover the source of the attacks and stop the murderer before they strike again?

Items

  • Bag of Tricks (Tan) Uncommon
  • Wand of Smiles Common
  • 3 x Arrow, +2 Rare

Story Awards

Enmity of Etana

You have caught the attention of Etana, a powerful wizard from the future that becomes a Lich. Making enemies you haven’t met yet is never a good idea.

item.title: DDAL-EB-08 - Parliament of Gears
item.description: Elemental Gem (Blue Sapphire), Halberd +2, Orb of Shielding (Lamannian Flint), 4 potions, and 3 legacy events
item.content:encoded:
Parliament of Gears

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 2 Released on August 2, 2020

On the edge of the Mournland, tensions are rising between the frontier folk and renegade warforged loyal to the Lord of Blades. When salvage workers start to go missing, the Brelish army sends the adventurers into the Mournland to mount a rescue. The first in a trilogy of adventures, the Dogs of War storyline.

Items

  • Elemental Gem (Blue Sapphire) Uncommon
  • Halberd +2 Rare
  • Orb of Shielding (Lamannian Flint) Common
  • 1 x Potion of Comprehension Common
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 1 x Potion of Resistance (Acid) Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Resistance (Lightning) Uncommon

Legacy Events

Beard Braid

Tellarak Natharon, nephew of the Oracle of War's creator Sulring Mroranon, gave you a beard braid to identify yourself to his uncle.

Bested Captain Reeve

You fought Captain Reeve of the 1st Mobile Divison and lived to tell the tale. Once per adventure in the Oracle of War campaign, you can use this legacy event to gain advantage on an Intimidation or Persuasion check made to interact with a warforged.

Eternal Gratitude

You rescued one or more captives from the Blades' Conclave. They won't forget your bravery and go out of their way to repay you. If you rescued any of the captives listed below, you gain their benefit:

  • Breyten Bokk d'Orien grants you a single spell component of up to 500 gp value.
  • Bunty Griswold leaves your group a legacy in her will. At the start of each Core Storyline adventure in the Oracle of War campaign, roll a d20. On a 1, Bunty dies and each character with this legacy event gains 250 gp. All players in your group must remove this legacy event from their Adventure Records.
  • Dabren Ty can silver one of your weapons or up to 20 pieces of ammunition.
  • Jurian Saal gifts you a potion of healing.
  • Kronce offers to help you out on a mission. You may call on the veteran to accompany you on any adventure in the Oracle of War campaign. When you use this legacy event, all players in your group must remove it from their Adventure Records.
  • Larten gives you a map of Cyre which grants you advantage to all Wisdom (Survival) checks made to navigate the Mournland.

item.title: CCC-BFG-01-03 - Dark Moon Return
item.description: Javelin of Lighting, 2 potions, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Dark Moon Return

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on July 21, 2020

Cassius Valen has returned to Thentia as an agent of Shar and has taken a powerful artifact that will power a vast teleportation network around the Moonsea. Will the heroes answer the call and stop Cassius before he sets Armageddon in motion? Part Three of the Avatar of Shar adventures.

Items

  • Javelin of Lighting Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Gaseous Form Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Growth Uncommon

Story Awards

Defender of the Moon

You aided the Temple of Selûne in Thentia by defeating agents of Shar that threatened the entire Moonsea. The priests of the temple remember your aide and honor your efforts. The temple will always be a safe shelter for you.

item.title: DDAL09-18 - Consequences of Choice
item.description: Oathbow, Ring of Warmth, 2 potions, 2 scrolls, 2 story awards, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
Consequences of Choice

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 3 Released on July 20, 2020

The soul of the commander of the Bloody Hooves has been spirited away by Zariel’s lieutenant, General Everbleed. The Bloody Hooves are in disarray and will not be the fighting force Dara had hoped without the iron will of their commander to direct them. To find them amidst the battlefields of Avernus, you are going to need help. Hopefully you have made some friends in the Nine Hells…

Items

  • Oathbow Very Rare
  • Ring of Warmth Uncommon
  • 2 x Potion of Superior Healing Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Blade Barrier Very Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Investiture of Wind Very Rare
  • 1 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

Failed to Protect!

Your efforts to improve the defenses of the Wandering Emporium were insufficient to keep everyone alive. (Circle appropriately.)

Fai ChenAliveDead
SlaggAliveDead
ElliachAliveDead
RasshAliveDead
Fhet’AhlaAliveDead
One-or-TwoAliveDead
SkidsAliveDead
Verwyyr*AliveDead
Raskamedies*AliveDead
Glanring Ironbelly*AliveDead
You Let Dara Die!

You failed to keep Dara alive during this adventure. This impacts her abilities when next you meet! How many times did she die? _______

item.title: DDAL09-19 - Fang and Claw
item.description: Scarab of Protection, Shield, +2, a potion, a scroll, 4 story awards, and 5 other items
item.content:encoded:
Fang and Claw

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 4 Released on July 20, 2020

Zariel’s Lieutenant General Everbleed has fled with Commander De La Reue’s soul, only to be captured by Yeenoghu’s brood preparing to rampage! Dara implores you to recover the commander, though his soul has been taken to a most unusual place. Part One of the Red Hunt series of adventures.

Items

  • Scarab of Protection Legendary
  • Shield, +2 Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Supreme Healing Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Meteor Swarm Legendary
  • 5 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

Clever Torso

You are carrying the armless, legless torso of a ghast—the infernal architect Khemed Rein. Khemed can talk and is desperate to escape the Nine Hells. If you fail a saving throw while carrying Khemed, you can choose to have the effect target him instead. This always destroys him, even if the effect deals no damage. If you leave the Nine Hells, you can return Khemed to his homeland and he is forever in your debt.

Ice Pact

The ice devil General Everbleed is escorting you on your mission to recover the soul of Rotger de la Reue. You can control the fiend in combat, but the DM can take control of his actions at any time. If you leave the Nine Hells, the general’s debt of service is removed, and he leaves your side.

Lost Hope

The name of the person whom you care for the most has been revealed to the demons of the Abyss, and you cannot shake the fear that they are being hunted. You gain an additional bond: “My actions have endangered my loved one.” At the end of every adventure you play, roll a d20. On a result of a 1, your fears come true as the demon prince Yeenoghu assassinates your loved one. The only way to remove this story award is to kill Yeenoghu.

You Let Dara Die

You failed to keep Dara alive during this adventure. This impacts her abilities when next you meet! How many times did she die? _______

item.title: DDAL09-20 - Where Devils Fear to Tread
item.description: Deathshield (Defender, Greatsword), Rod of the Pact Keeper, +2, 2 potions, a scroll, 4 story awards, and 3 other items
item.content:encoded:
Where Devils Fear to Tread

Season 9 Adventure for Tier 4 Released on July 20, 2020

The Commander’s soul has been cast through the portal into the Death Dells. You must follow into the lair of Yeenoghu and rescue the Commander before the Beast of Butchery devours him! Part Two of the Red Hunt series of adventures.

Items

  • Deathshield (Defender, Greatsword) Legendary
  • Rod of the Pact Keeper, +2 Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Flying Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Longevity Very Rare
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Gate Legendary
  • 3 x Soul Coin Uncommon

Story Awards

Birth of a Demon Prince

Against all advice and sanity, you have consumed the essence of the Demon Prince Yeenoghu on his home plane: the 422nd layer of the Abyss. Raw chaos and incarnate evil flows through your body, warping it into the monster that your nightmares feared might dwell within. As you change, the layer responds to suit your whims, twisting with newfound corruption. You are forever retired from D&D Adventurers League play and you cannot be returned by any means. This character’s story has ended for you, but your friends have gained a powerful new enemy who knows them all too well.

Enemy of Elisande

You have attempted to solve a problem with Elisande by using violence against her. The Chosen of Cyric will not forget.

Thanks of Ilmater

You have worked the will of the gods of light to maintain the balance of the Blood War. If you are 20th level (or upon achieving 20th level) you may select the boon of immortality or the boon of planar travel from the Dungeon Master’s Guide. If you select the boon of planar travel, it takes you to the Brightwater: the realm of Ilmater and Sune in the Seven Heavens of Celestia.

Tipping the Balance

You have drastically altered the balance of the Blood War, potentially bringing about the end of reality. All devils bare you a grudge and you make all Charisma checks against fiends at disadvantage. In addition, they no longer answer your call. All spells or abilities that summon a devil automatically fail.

item.title: CCC-AWE-01-02 - The Chi Directive
item.description: Lantern of Revealing
item.content:encoded:
The Chi Directive

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on July 19, 2020

Stories of Muckflash Marsh have been told for decades—deep whispered voices and floating lights. Recently the lights have brightened, and the voices turned higher pitched. A young woman has brought tales of evil doings at the march and a plea for aid. Part One of the Mischief of Profiteering series.

Items

  • Lantern of Revealing Uncommon

item.title: CCC-MAG-01-03 - The Clock that Didn't Tick
item.description: Cape of the Mountebank, 2 potions, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
The Clock that Didn't Tick

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released on July 19, 2020

Disappearing shipments, missing alchemists—and proven musical acts whose rehearsals sound terrible! Instead of showing off Thentia to potential trading partners and giving the locals something to celebrate, the pall over this year’s Magic and Gold Festival threatens to drive business to Melvaunt and give the locals a reason to riot.

Items

  • Cape of the Mountebank Rare
  • 1 x Elixir of Health Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Invulnerability Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Vitality Very Rare

item.title: CCC-ODFC-03-03 - The Cause of All Life's Problems
item.description: Figurine of Wondrous Power (Marble Elephant), Tankard of Sobriety, a scroll, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
The Cause of All Life's Problems

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released on July 19, 2020

Riswyn Rumnaheim, a young female dwarf, has recently discovered that her sister has survived the Rage of Demons, but alas, this sister has been tainted by the Abyssal presence of the demon that owns her soul. She is on the lookout for adventurers to help her remove the taint, allowing her to recover at least some of the family that she lost. The characters will discover how to cleanse the soul and in so doing put down a rising evil that may threaten the surface.

Items

  • Figurine of Wondrous Power (Marble Elephant) Rare
  • Tankard of Sobriety Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Locate Object Uncommon

Story Awards

Friend of the Clan Rumnaheim

As a Friend of Clan Rumnaheim, you can request entrance to the Earthspur Mines and Town, even if they are currently closed to outsiders. If Riswyn, new head of Clan Rumnaheim, is present at the mines (at the discretion of the DM), she can vouchsafe your good behavior and have you granted entrance. If you abuse this trust (at the discretion of the DM), void this story award.

Honorary Member of Clan Rumnaheim

You are considered an honorary member of the Rumnaheim clan. On your interactions within the Earthspur Mines and Town you are considered a dwarf, even if you are of a different race. For better or for worse.

item.title: DDAL-EB-07 - Song of the Sky
item.description: Necklace of Adaptation, Soarsled, 5 legacy events, and 6 other items
item.content:encoded:
Song of the Sky

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 2 Released on July 5, 2020

The orphan Sky Blue lives with her awakened seagull companion in the eaves of Sharn’s highest buildings and survives by stealing scraps from the tables of the city’s nobility. According to the Draconic Prophecy, this humble thief is destined to guide Breland’s future. The adventurers must get to her before her rivals—if they can catch her!

Items

  • Necklace of Adaptation Uncommon
  • Soarsled Uncommon
  • 5 x Alchemist's Fire Common
  • Feather Token Rare

Legacy Events

Emerald Claw Captive

You captured Emerald Claw agent Irullan Karnach alive. At the end of this adventure, you must decide what to do with her:

  • Hand her over to the Brelish authorities and claim a reward of 100 gp.
  • Keep her as a captive. While she remains alive, you must pay 10 gp at the end of each adventure to cover the expenses of her incarceration. If you have access to your own prison cell, you can keep her imprisoned for free.
  • Execute her.
Flamewing's Favored

You impressed the sphinx Flamewind with your performance during the steeplechase.

Mark of the Sphinx

You took Sky Blue to the sphinx Flamewind, who gave her a protective amulet to wear. Flamewind has asked you to look after the girl, and promised she'll be in touch.

The Show Must Go On

The bard Stormflower helped you save Sky Blue and is now committed to forging your legend in song.

  • If you write Stormflower a decent song of at least three verses and hand it in to your DM before playing DDAL-EB-08 Parliament of Gears, Stormflower makes you an honorary member of the Circle of Song: a secret alliance of bards and entertainers.
Wing and a Prayer

You left the city with Sky Blue to go in search of her father, who supposedly died during the Last War. Flamewind is unhappy that you defied her and sends spies to locate you.

  • At the end of each adventure in this campaign (including this one), your party must succeed on a group DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check to stay ahead of the sphinx's agents. If your group fails, tick this box and stop making checks. You are now being watched!

item.title: CCC-GAD02-01 - The Monster Within
item.description: Moon-Touched Rapier, Goggles of Night, and a potion
item.content:encoded:
The Monster Within

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released on June 30, 2020

A mind flayer has called for a massive conference of monsters in the Underdark beneath Hillsfar. Trolls, umber hulks, demons, and more have answered the illithid's call. To infiltrate this gruesome menagerie, you must embrace the monster within yourself.

Items

  • Moon-Touched Rapier Common
  • Goggles of Night Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Giant Strength (Hill) Uncommon

item.title: CCC-COS-02-01 - 38 Souls
item.description: Wand of Secrets, 2 potions, a spellbook, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
38 Souls

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on June 4, 2020

The death of a mysterious philanthropist has left a few simple tasks unfinished. This may either be the easiest adventure of your life, or your last. Part One of the Hammer of the Gods sequence.

Items

  • Wand of Secrets Uncommon
  • 1 x Oil of Slipperiness Uncommon
  • 2 x Potion of Healing Common

Spellbooks

  • Illusionist’s Spellbook: dancing lights, mage hand, minor illusion, poison spray, color spray, disguise self, mage armor, magic missile, invisibility, mirror image, phantasmal force, major image, phantom steed, and phantasmal killer

item.title: CCC-FAD-01 - Out The Back
item.description: Boots of False Tracks, Welcomers Gloves (Gloves of Thievery), and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Out The Back

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on June 2, 2020

The town of Phlan has had a lot of trouble, but at least today there aren’t any dragons in the sky. You’ve received a mysterious summons from a citizen of Phlan asking for your help, with the promise of a chance to do some good, what are you waiting for?!

Items

  • Boots of False Tracks Uncommon
  • Welcomers Gloves (Gloves of Thievery) Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Heroism Rare

item.title: DDAL-EB-06 - The Last Word
item.description: Ring of Evasion, Wand of Fear, Weapon, +1, a potion, and 3 legacy events
item.content:encoded:
The Last Word

Oracle of War Adventure for Tier 2 Released on June 2, 2020

Guided by prophecy, the adventurers seek out a spy operating in the heart of Wroat’s Royal Court. The Oracle of War has linked him to a great turning point in Khorvaire’s future, but he’s embedded in deep cover and difficult to reach. Thankfully, every agent has a weak link, and love is blind.

Items

  • Ring of Evasion Rare
  • Wand of Fear Rare
  • Weapon, +1 Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon

Legacy Events

Dark Lanterns Flicker

Mercutia ir'Gontarli was assassinated during the ball. The city of Wroat is put on high alert as rumors swirl about who could be responsible. This event has repercussions later in the campaign.

Runaway Lovers

You helped Orsino and Cesaria escape to build new lives for themselves. They are forever grateful for your assistance.

  • Once only, during any adventure in the Oracle of War campaign, you can call on Orsino for assistance. You must have at least 8 hours free to contact him. Orsino's spy network can answer three questions for you, as per the commune spell. When you use this legacy event, all players in your group must remove it from their Adventure Records.
Silver Torch Extinguished

Oliviér ir'Volett was exposed during the ball as a spy and assassin and paid the ultimate price. As the authorities trace his steps, word spreads that the nation of Thrane could be responsible for the killing. This event has repercussions later in the campaign.

item.title: CCC-CIC-15 - Den of the Dead Witch
item.description: Necklace of Fireballs, 2 potions, a scroll, and one other item
item.content:encoded:
Den of the Dead Witch

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Cold Iron Conventions on May 24, 2020

All the mothers of Windy Valley are plagued by foul dreams as mining operations uncover a lost level of the dungeons beneath the ruins of the Tempest Mage’s tower. Evil stirs and heroes are called on to reveal its source.

Items

  • Necklace of Fireballs Rare
  • 2 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Tasha's Hideous Laughter Common
  • 1 x The Witchstone (Walloping Ammunition, Bullet) Common

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK2-05 - Finglebruggle's Phantomball Field
item.description: Boots of Striding and Springing and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Finglebruggle's Phantomball Field

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Gamehole Publishing on May 14, 2020

The heroes are pulled into a fast-paced sport played in certain parts of the Border Kingdoms. But the trophy, the community's pride and joy, is stolen by a vengeful wizard who challenges the party to retrieve it in his own private “Finglebruggleball“ dungeon. Can the heroes use their newly acquired sports skills to overcome the wizard's deadly traps and mysteries?

Items

  • Boots of Striding and Springing Uncommon

Story Awards

Phantomball Champion

You are a champion phantomball player, and your status has spread throughout the region. Any civilized NPC you meet for the first time in the Border Kingdoms has a chance of being a phantomball fan who recognizes you.

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK2-06 - Eye of Darkness, Heart of Light
item.description: Mind Fortress (Ring of Mind Shielding), 2 potions, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Eye of Darkness, Heart of Light

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Gamehole Publishing on May 14, 2020

Undead hordes continue to ravage Blackbarn, but hope exists. To the north in the deep wood lies a ruined tower, and within a nearly-forgotten item is rumored capable of drawing the walking dead to it. Can you find the Eye of Darkness and harness its dark energies for the good of Blackbarn?

Items

  • Mind Fortress (Ring of Mind Shielding) Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Climbing Common
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon

Story Awards

Heart of Light

One character—yours—was trusted by one of the spirits of Ravinan. This blessing manifests as a glowing light radiating from the character’s chest where their heart would be, while in the presence of the Eye of Darkness. This story award may have an impact in future Border Kingdoms adventures.

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK2-08 - Ancient Rivals
item.description: Clockwork Amulet, Staff of Healing, 2 potions, and a spellbook
item.content:encoded:
Ancient Rivals

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by Gamehole Publishing on May 14, 2020

A chilling darkness continues to creep across the Border Kingdoms. House Gilmann, a wealthy merchant house from Emrys, has discovered the members of one of its caravans are possessed by evil spirits. Can you discover the source of the possessions in time to save them?

Items

  • Clockwork Amulet Common
  • Staff of Healing Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Giant Strength (Cloud) Very Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Superior Healing Rare

Spellbooks

  • Fyndulaas's Spellbook: detect magic, magic missile, shield, thunderwave, detect thoughts, invisibility, Melf's acid arrow, mirror image, animate dead, counterspell, dispel magic, fireball, blight, dimension door, cloudkill, scrying, disintegrate, globe of invulnerability, finger of death, plane shift, dominate monster, power word stun, and power word kill

    Written in the very back of the book are scribed the true names of three demons that Fyndulaas would oft times summon to do his bidding: Gaggazoth, the Cleaver of the Horned King (a tanarukk); Valgurrek the Gluttonous (a barlgura); Thurzroggad, Scythe of the Six Fingered Lord (a babau).

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK2-01 - Shadows of Rith Keep
item.description: Charlatan's Die, Saddle of the Cavalier, 2 potions, and a scroll
item.content:encoded:
Shadows of Rith Keep

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Gamehole Publishing on May 10, 2020

The ruins of Rith Keep lie a short distance from the small Border Kingdoms thorp of Largrin. In times past, the keep was home to the self-appointed River Lord of Largrin, a warrior of great skill who protected the surrounding lands. It is now little more than a stone shell, which rumors say is haunted. Are these tales simply the fanciful stories of local beet farmers, or does something more sinister lurk in the shadows of Rith Keep?

Items

  • Charlatan's Die Common
  • Saddle of the Cavalier Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 1 x Spell Scroll of Bless Common

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK2-02 - The Folly of Sneaky Simon
item.description: Decanter of Endless Water and 2 potions
item.content:encoded:
The Folly of Sneaky Simon

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Gamehole Publishing on May 10, 2020

The council of merchant dukes from the town of Emrys have recently been troubled by a highwayman outside of the city spooking off would be merchants and customers alike. Whispers speak of a tiny demon in a red hat with knives faster than sound, but what is the real truth?

Items

  • Decanter of Endless Water Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Animal Friendship Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK2-03 - Framed in Felshroun
item.description: Cloak of the Manta Ray, 2 potions, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
Framed in Felshroun

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Gamehole Publishing on May 10, 2020

As the heroes are celebrating vanquishing a cursed spirit in Felshroun, they find out it’s not as dead as they’d hoped. A frantic chase through the city ensues. Can the heroes banish it for good before too much damage is done?

Items

  • Cloak of the Manta Ray Uncommon
  • 2 x Potion of Healing Common

Story Awards

Hero of Felshroun

You are known, throughout Felshroun, as a hero of the city. Foresters will treat you with respect, and generally assume you’re on the up-and-up. The Baron will listen seriously to what you have to say.

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK2-04 - Wicked Little Things
item.description: Wand of Secrets and a potion
item.content:encoded:
Wicked Little Things

Convention Created Content for Tier 1 Released by Gamehole Publishing on May 10, 2020

Lord Barlett is at the end of his wit trying to keep his Manor together. Doors slamming, objects disappearing, harm upon the Manor children and more have plagued the estate for far too long. Can the adventurers determine the cause of these events?

Items

  • Wand of Secrets Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Healing Common

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK2-07 - In The Dead of Knight
item.description: Hat of Disguise and 3 potions
item.content:encoded:
In The Dead of Knight

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Gamehole Publishing on May 10, 2020

When a young prince’s parents are kidnapped, it is the characters who answer the call for help. Can they learn the hidden truth before it's too late or will they join countless other unfortunate souls, forgotten and dead in fetid swamp waters?

Items

  • Hat of Disguise Uncommon
  • 2 x Potion of Healing Common
  • 1 x Potion of Resistance (Cold) Uncommon

item.title: CCC-GHC-BK2-09 - Breath of Fire
item.description: Dark Shard Amulet, Figurine of Wonderous Power (Onyx Dog), and 2 potions
item.content:encoded:
Breath of Fire

Convention Created Content for Tier 3 Released by Gamehole Publishing on May 10, 2020

One of the merchant princes of the Border Kingdoms has a truly heroic quest for you. Reports from the south talk of a fire breathing beast that is causing problems with the caravans along the roads. The task is more than to just slay the beast—this merchant is looking to make use of an artifact that came into his possession. He wants you to capture it with the artifact and return it to him, to use for the betterment of the entire Border Kingdoms. Are you up to the task?

Items

  • Dark Shard Amulet Common
  • Figurine of Wonderous Power (Onyx Dog) Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Giant Strength (Frost) Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Superior Healing Rare

item.title: CCC-VOTE-01-01 - A Small Trifle
item.description: Emerald Eye (Ersatz Eye), Jeny’s Hairpin (Javelin of Warning), 2 potions, a spellbook, and a story award
item.content:encoded:
A Small Trifle

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released on May 7, 2020

Jeny Greenteeth again needs the help of adventurers, and this time, she is willing to pay a large price for their help—restoring the pact between Phlan and the fey of the Quivering Forest. All she needs is a coin from a dragon hoard. Easy enough, right? You may change your mind when you hear the name of the dragon…

Items

  • Emerald Eye (Ersatz Eye) Common
  • Jeny’s Hairpin (Javelin of Warning) Uncommon
  • 1 x Potion of Diminution Rare
  • 1 x Potion of Greater Healing Uncommon

Spellbooks

  • Mage's Spellbook: fire bolt, light, mage hand, prestidigitation, detect magic, mage armor, magic missile, shield, misty step, suggestion, counterspell, fireball, fly, greater invisibility, ice storm, and cone of cold

Story Awards

Banned: Stygia

The frozen, inhospitable wilderness of Stygia is home to many vile creatures as well as an uncountable number from the Material Plane. Desperate criminals and those condemned to death may pray to Levistus, the ruler of Stygia, for freedom; should he answer, they are transported here. For reasons known only to you and him, you are forever banned from setting foot within Stygia. Perhaps you redeemed too many souls, or maybe you were discovered to be in league with Geryon, the former ruler of this realm; regardless, Levistus has closed this later of the Nine Hells to you. You can’t participate in further adventures in this place.

A character with this story award may visit other areas of the Nine Hells but has been banned from Stygia.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON6-1 - A Reopened Eye
item.description: Enduring Spellbook, Fey Cloak of Protection, a spellbook, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
A Reopened Eye

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 3, 2020

Conflicts arising in both the Feywild and the Prime have caused some in both planes to call for a return of the Balance, and for new alliances between the fey and mortals. A seer new to the Moonshaes has prophesied your help in opening a new portal between these worlds. Part 1 of the Earthmother’s Eye trilogy.

Items

  • Enduring Spellbook Common
  • Fey Cloak of Protection Uncommon

Spellbooks

  • The Tome of Anothas: absorb elements, alarm, cause fear, comprehend languages, detect magic, feather fall, mage armor, magic missile, alter self, dragon's breath, knock, magic weapon, mind spike, Nystul's magic aura, tongues, catnap, counterspell, Leomund's tiny hut, summon lesser demons, charm monster, Mordenkainen's faithful hound, enervation, hold monster, infernal calling, Rary's telepathic bond, and create homunculus

Story Awards

Ashoral’s Friendship

You met with the guardian of the moonwell and resolved your differences peacefully, rather than resorting to violence. The druid guardian Ashoral considers you a friend, which may bear fruit at a later date.

Zanz’s Appreciation

You rescued Zanzantook from his fate of being devoured by animals enraged at his terrible poetry. Whether you like it or not, he considers you a friend. This friendship may bear fruit at a later date.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON6-2 - Troubled Visions
item.description: Eladrin Boots of Elvenkind, Moon-Touched Sword, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Troubled Visions

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 3, 2020

A newly opened moonwell proves unstable. An eladrin community in the Feywild calls for aid, as their home has been torn asunder and transformed by planar rifts. You must enter the moonwell to seal the rifts threatening the region before this instability pours over to the Prime Material. Part 2 of the Earthmother’s Eye trilogy.

Items

  • Eladrin Boots of Elvenkind Uncommon
  • Moon-Touched Sword Common

Story Awards

Mairin’s Debt

Mairin is deeply indebted to you for proving her lineage. She has travelled to many places and knows a good deal of people across Faerûn. If you need an item or expert that isn’t easily obtained, she might be able to get it for you—given enough time.

Saviors of Temerity Bay

The adventurers saved a community of immortals from a troublesome peril; while it’s unlikely any eladrin or powerful fey will actually show up to help you if you ask, a spirit of the woods might allow you to pass, or a dire bear might decide to look elsewhere for a meal.

item.title: CCC-BMG-MOON6-3 - Planar Convergence
item.description: Horn of Silent Alarm, Javelin of Lightning, and 2 story awards
item.content:encoded:
Planar Convergence

Convention Created Content for Tier 2 Released by Baldman Games on May 3, 2020

After a moonwell portal is permanently opened to the Feywild, fey and humans have begun to live together in harmony. But when a new threat forms on the horizon, darkness threatens to overwhelm the moonwell and consume the Moonshae Isles. As the fey and human denizens rush to mount defenses, will their alliance be enough to defeat the coming army? Part 3 of the Earthmother’s Eye trilogy.

Items

  • Horn of Silent Alarm Common
  • Javelin of Lightning Uncommon

Story Awards

Asper the Jellyflumph Familiar

This tiny jellyfish is native to the Feywild, evidenced by its translucent body which strobes pastel colors that change with its mood. It floats through the skies as if the air was made of water. If killed or reduced to 0 hit points, the jellyflumph can be recalled via find familiar, and uses the statistics of a bat from the Monster Manual.

Critter Keeper

You’ve befriended the fey creatures that now inhabit Rushdown Wood. When traveling through the Rushdown Wood, you will find the creatures very helpful and often find them skittering around your feet or sitting on your shoulder.
